varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::begin () const

listitem.para: Obtain an iterator pointing at the source point of the polycurve.
A bidirectional iterator that allows traversing the points that comprise a polycurve's subcurves.
A bidirectional iterator that allows traversing the points that comprise a polycurve's subcurves.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::Curve_2 (Iterator first, Iterator last)

listitem.para: For backwards compatibility, it is possible to call this constructor with a range whose value-type is SubcurveTraits_2::Point_2. In this case, the constructed polycurve will concatenate the $n$th point with the $(n+1)$-st point in the range (using a SubcurveTraits_2::Subcurve_2's). This functionality is deprecated. Instead use the Construct_curve_2 functors.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::end () const

listitem.para: Obtain an iterator pointing after the end of the polycurve.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::points () const

listitem.para: Obtain the number of subcurve end-points that comprise the polycurve.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::push_back (const Point_2 &p)

listitem.para: Add a new point to the polycurvs, which becomes the new target point of pi.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::rbegin () const

listitem.para: Obtain an iterator pointing at the target point of the polycurve.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::rend () const

listitem.para: Obtain an iterator pointing before the beginning of the polycurve.

varlistentry.term: Member CGAL::Arr_polycurve_traits_2< SubcurveTraits_2 >::Curve_2< SubcurveType_2, PointType_2 >::size () const

listitem.para: Obtain the number of subcurves composing the polycurve (equivalent to pi.points() - 1).
